 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּלֵא‎</span> [[Gen.43.10|Gen 43:10]]; [[Judg.14.18|Judg 14:18]]; [[2Sam.2.27|2Sam 2:27]]; [[Ps.27.13|Ps 27:13]], elsewhere <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּלֵי‎</span><sub>10</sub> ==if not, unless== (from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּ‎</span> ***if***, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵא‎</span>, by dissimilation ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 236, 489</sup>) for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span> ***not***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), the negative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּ‎</span>, and used similarly: — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** followed by perfect, [[Judg.14.18|Judg 14:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לולא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חרשׁתם ֗֗֗ לא מצאתם‎</span> ***unless*** ye had ploughed with my heifer, ye would not have found out my riddle, [[1Sam.25.34|1Sam 25:34]] (second <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כי‎</span> resumptive: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span> **1 d**), [[Ps.106.23|Ps 106:23]] with apod, introd. by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי עַתָּה‎</span> [[Gen.31.42|Gen 31:42]]; [[Gen.43.10|Gen 43:10]] by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָז‎</span> [[2Sam.2.27|2Sam 2:27]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כי‎</span> resumptive); by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּמְעַט‎</span> [[Isa.1.9|Isa 1:9]] with an aposiop. [[Ps.27.13|Ps 27:13]] ***if I had not believed ...!*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** followed by imperfect [[Deut.32.27|Deut 32:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמרתי ֗֗֗ לולי אגור‎</span> I should have said, &amp;c . . . . ***except*** I dreaded, &amp;c. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** followed by participle, [[2Kgs.3.14|2Kgs 3:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** without a verb, [[Ps.94.17|Ps 94:17]] (apodosis <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כמעט‎</span>), [[Ps.119.92|Ps 119:92]] (apodosis <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָז‎</span>). In the later language, [[Ps.124.1|Ps 124:1]]; [[Ps.124.2|Ps 124:2]] -<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּלֵי י‎</span> (apodosis <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲזַי‎</span> ***except that ...*** (compare Aramaic, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[Ps.106.23|Ps 106:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִילּוּלֵי ֗֗֗ דִּי‎</span> [[Ps.27.13|Ps 27:13]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]). — Read also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּלֵי‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוּלַי‎</span> in [[Num.22.33|Num 22:33]] (apodosis <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי עַתָּה‎</span>). See further on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּ‎</span> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּלֵא‎</span> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§§ 139-145</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>iii. 487f; 565</sup>.
